channel.title: Minibasins on Zoltán Sylvester
channel.description: Recent content in Minibasins on Zoltán Sylvester

item.title: Stratal patterns in salt-withdrawal minibasins
item.description: These are animations that accompany our 2015 article on the stratigraphy of salt-withdrawal basins on the slope (Sylvester, Z., Cantelli, A., and Pirmez, C., 2015, Stratigraphic evolution of intraslope minibasins: Insights from surface-based model: AAPG Bulletin, v. 99, no. 6, p. 1099–1129). Convergence: Onlap: Sinusoidal input, no bypass: Sinusoidal input and bypass: Constant-to-sinusoidal input, constant subsidence, no bypass: Constant-to-sinusoidal input, constant subsidence, and bypass: Constant-to-out-of-phase sediment input: Subsidence and sediment input phases: Static fill-and-spill: Dynamic fill-and-spill:
